casebody.data:
BENISTAR EMPLOYER SERVICES TRUST COMPANY et al.
v.
James J. BENINCASA et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided May 29, 2019

Daniel J. Krisch, Daniel P. Scapellati and Logan A. Carducci, Hartford, in support of the petition.

Jerome Patger and Mark J. Kallenbach, pro hac vice, in opposition.

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 189 Conn. App. 304, 207 A.3d 67 (2019), is denied.

ECKER, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
